Class.ClassComment: CacheEventFilterConverterFactory /** * Factory that can produce {@link CacheEventFilterConverter} instances. * @since 7.2 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Retrieves a cache event filter and converter instance from this factory. * @param params parameters for the factory to be used to create converter instances * @return a {@link CacheEventFilterConverter} instance usedto filter and reduce size of event payloads */
